meanings.definition: A conspiracy formed in opposition to another conspiracy.
meanings.sent1: The group of friends planned a counterconspiracy to expose the secret plot.
meanings.sent2: The detective uncovered a counterconspiracy aimed at sabotaging the original plan.
meanings.sent3: The counterconspiracy to bake cookies instead of cake was a delicious twist.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was a counterconspiracy against their negativity, spreading joy everywhere.
meanings.sent5: The colorful counterconspiracy painted a vivid picture of defiance and unity.

meanings.definition: The act of conspiring against a conspiracy.
meanings.sent1: The whistleblower's revelation led to a counterconspiracy to protect the truth.
meanings.sent2: The rival gang's counterconspiracy threatened the stability of the criminal organization.
meanings.sent3: The counterconspiracy to replace coffee with tea caused quite a stir in the office.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was a counterconspiracy against their doubts, proving them all wrong.
meanings.sent5: The unexpected counterconspiracy added a new layer of intrigue to the mystery.
